game.name: Whack No Hand
game.description:
One of the most interesting and interactive free online games to play, Whack No Hand is a really a big fun. Play this intense online action game and enjoy the pleasure of protecting the virtual fingers of your character from being hurt! You will surely have a great fun while helping pirate to leave with all his fingers untouched. Your extreme alertness and concentration is going to play a major role in guiding you towards the victory. Avoid cutting your character as long as you can to create your new high score in this cool arcade game!
Make sure to click at the right moment to improve your score. A sharp dagger is ready for you. So, grab it immediately and check if you are capable enough to hit the correct spots without getting your character injured. You are sure to have a great fun in this brainstorming game for kids. Play wisely and overcome the challenges with a focused mind! Lots of surprising things are waiting for you in this one of the best action games for boys. The time has come when you can make yourself more mature by accepting challenges and difficulties. 
The task is not as difficult as you think. All you need to do is just follow all the instructions and rules of the game to make your win. Earn the maximum possible points by not causing bloodshed! You will be given three lives, so use every life to earn maximum points and beat your last score. Your visual and manipulation skills will be tested while trying out this one of the top interesting games. Donâ€™t hesitate in stretching your brain to get your job done to achieve the objective of the game. Good luck to have a blast, boys!!
